mapper.select: SELECT board.write_id AS writeId, board.board_id AS boardId, board.user_id AS userId, user.username AS userName, board.created_at AS createdAt, board.title AS title, board.content AS content FROM board LEFT JOIN user on board.user_id = user.user_id WHERE write_id = #{writeId}

SELECT comment_id AS commentId, comment.user_id AS userId, user.username AS userName, board_id AS BoardId, content AS content, created_at AS createdAt FROM comment LEFT JOIN user on comment.user_id = user.user_id WHERE status = 0 ORDER BY comment_id desc;
mapper.insert: insert into comment (user_id, board_id, content, created_at) values (#{userId},#{boardId},#{content},#{now})
INSERT IGNORE INTO boardViewLog (view_log, user_id, write_id, view_time) VALUES (#{viewId},#{userId},#{writeId},#{now})
mapper.select: SELECT view_log AS viewLogId, boardViewLog.user_id AS userId, user.username AS userName, write_id AS writeId, view_time AS viewTime FROM boardViewLog LEFT JOIN user ON boardViewLog.user_id = user.user_id;
